const int N = 1e5+5;
int g[N];
int quick_sort(int l, int r)
{
	int p=l, q=r, x=g[l+r >> 1];
	while(p<=q)
	{
		while(g[p] < x) p++;
		while(g[q] > x) q--;
		if(p<=q) swap(g[p], g[q]), p++, q--;
	}
	if(q<r) quick_sort(q, r);
	if(p>l) quick_sort(l, p);
}

å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º

O(nlgn)O(nlgn) O(nlgn)

ç¬¬kå¤§æ•°
const int N = 1e5+5;
int g[N];
int kth_num(int l, int r, int k)
{
	int p=l, q=r, x=g[l+r >>1];
	while(p<=q)
	{
		while(g[p] < x) p++;
		while(g[q] < x) q--;
		if(p<=q) swap(g[p], g[q]), p++, q--;
	}
	if(p<=k) return kth_num(p, r); //åœåœ¨äº†ç¬¬pä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼Œæ¯”ç¬¬kä¸ªè¦å°ï¼Œç»“æœåœ¨å³è¾¹
	else if(q>=k) return kth_num(l, q); //ä¸åœ¨å³è¾¹ç»“æœå°±åœ¨å·¦è¾¹
	else return g[l]; //å‰äºŒè€…éƒ½ä¸æ˜¯ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸­é—´.
}

//æŸ¥è¯¢ç¬¬kå¤§æ—¶ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ä¿è¯å…ƒç´ ä¸€å®šè¶³å¤Ÿ
//å£°æ˜
priority_queue<int> bh;//å¤§é¡¶å †
priority_queue<int, vector<int>, greater<int>> sh;//å°é¡¶å †
//æ’å…¥æ“ä½œ
if(!bh.size() || x > bh.top()) sh.push(x);
else bh.push(x);
//æŸ¥è¯¢æ“ä½œï¼Œå½“å‰è¦æŸ¥è¯¢ç¬¬kå¤§
while(bh.size() > k)
{
	int p = bh.top(); bh.pop();
	sh.push(p);
}
while(bh.size() < k)
{
	int p = sh.top(); sh.pop();
	bh.push(p);
}

å¯¹é¡¶å †çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¹Ÿå¯è¿‘ä¼¼çœ‹ä½œ

å¯¹é¡¶å †åœ¨æ²¡æœ‰åˆ é™¤ã€æ¯æ¬¡è¦æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç¬¬Kå¤§æ•°é€’å¢æ—¶æ—¶é—´å¸¸æ•°è¦ä¼˜ä¸€äº›.

å½’å¹¶æ¿å­
const int N = 1e5+5;
int g[N], b[N]; //bç”¨äºå¤‡ä»½
void MergeSort(int l, int r)
{
	if(l==r) return; //è¾¹ç•Œ åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´  æ— éœ€æ’åº
	int mid = l+r >> 1;
	MergeSort(l, mid); MergeSort(mid+1, r);
	int p=l, q=mid+1, cur=p;
	while(p<=mid && q<=r)
	{
		if(g[p] <= g[q]) b[cur++] = g[p++];
		else b[cur++] = g[q++];
	}
	while(p<=mid) b[cur++] = g[p++];
	while(q<=r) b[cur++] = g[q++];
	for(int i=l; i<=r; i++) g[i] = b[i];
}
é€†åºå¯¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°

é¦–å…ˆè¯æ˜é€†åºå¯¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°å°±æ˜¯å½’å¹¶æ’åºä¸­äº¤æ¢çš„æ¬¡æ•°
å°†[1, n]çš„é—®é¢˜åˆ†è§£ä¸º[1, mid]ä¸[mid+1, n]çš„é—®é¢˜
å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ä¸¤ä¸ªå­é—®é¢˜çš„è§£ï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹çš„éƒ¨åˆ†è§£å°±æ˜¯åœ¨å·¦è¾¹å¹¶ä¸”æ¯”å³è¾¹å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ å¯¹æ•°äº†ï¼Œè¿™ç”¨å½’å¹¶æ’åºå¾ˆå¥½å®ç°.

const int N = 1e5+5;
int g[N], b[N];
void MergeSort(int l, int r)
{
	int ans = 0;
	if(l==r) return;
	int mid = l+r >> 1;
	MergeSort(l, mid); MergeSort(mid+1, r);
	int p=l, q=mid+1, cur=l;
	//è®°å½•å³åŒºé—´çš„æ–¹å¼
	while(p<=mid && q<=r)
	{
		if(g[p] <= g[q]) b[cur++] = g[p++]; //æ­¤å¤„æ˜¯å°äºç­‰äº
		//æ˜¯å› ä¸ºå°äºç­‰äºçš„è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯å°äºçš„è¯å½“ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ç›¸ç­‰åæ ‡
		//qå‘å‰ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ç­”æ¡ˆæ›´æ–°ï¼Œä½†pè¿™ä¸ªç‚¹ä¹Ÿè¢«ç®—äº†è¿›å».
		else b[cur++] = g[q++], ans += mid - p + 1;
	}
	while(p<=mid) b[cur++] = g[p++];
	while(q<=r) b[cur++] = g[q++];
	//è®°å½•å·¦åŒºé—´çš„æ–¹å¼
	while(p<=mid && q<=r)
	{
		if(g[p] <= g[q]) b[cur++] = g[p++], ans += q - (mid + 1); 
		//å°äºç­‰äºåŒç†.
		//å¦‚æœæ˜¯å°äºé‚£ä¹ˆä¼šåŠ å…¥q. ä¸‹æ¬¡æ›´æ–°æ—¶ç­”æ¡ˆä¼šå¤šå‡ºæ¥
		else b[cur++] = g[q++];
	}
	while(p<=mid) b[cur++] = g[p++], ans += q - (mid + 1); //å³ r - mid
	while(q<=r) b[cur++] = g[q++];
	for(int i=l; i<=r; i++) g[i] = b[i];
	/*æœ‰ä¸¤ç§è®¡æ•°æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ›´ä¼˜ç§€çš„ä¸€ç§æ˜¯è®°å½•å½“å³åŒºé—´åŠ å…¥æ—¶çš„
	  è¿™æ ·çš„è®¡æ•°æ–¹å¼åªéœ€è®°å½•ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œåœ¨åé¢çš„å¾ªç¯ä¸­æ— éœ€è®°å½•
	  è€Œè®°å½•å·¦åŒºé—´åŠ å…¥æ—¶çš„è®¡æ•°æ–¹å¼éœ€è¦è®°å½•ä¸¤æ¬¡.
	*/
}

const int N = 1e5+5;
int g[N];
int l=1, r=n;
int x; //query
while(l<r)
{
	int mid = l + r >> 1;
	if(g[mid] >= x) r = mid;
	else l = mid + 1;
}
å°äºç­‰äºæ¨¡æ¿
const int N = 1e5+5;
int g[N];
int l=1, r=n;
int x; //query
while(l<r)
{
	int mid = l+r+1 >> 1;
	if(g[mid] <= x) l=mid;
	else r = mid-1;
}

æ³¨æ„å°äºç­‰äºæ—¶å€™è¦åŠ 1é˜²æ­¢æ­»å¾ªç¯

âˆ’10000â‰¤nâ‰¤10000âˆ’10000â‰¤nâ‰¤10000 âˆ’10000â‰¤nâ‰¤10000


double l=-100ï¼Œ r=100;
double n; cin>>n;
while(fabs(l-r) <= 1e-7)
{
    double mid = (l+r)/2;
    if(mid*mid*mid<=n) l=mid;
    else r=mid;
}

æµ®ç‚¹æ•°ä¸éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘å°äºç­‰äºæ¿å­åŠ ä¸€çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæœ‰fabsåšä¿è¯ã€‚

// C = A + B, A >= 0, B >= 0
vector<int> add(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B)
{
    if (A.size() < B.size()) return add(B, A);

    vector<int> C;
    int t = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i ++ )
    {
        t += A[i];
        if (i < B.size()) t += B[i];
        C.push_back(t % 10);
        t /= 10;
    }

    if (t) C.push_back(t);
    return C;
}

é«˜ç²¾åº¦å‡æ³•

// C = A - B, æ»¡è¶³A >= B, A >= 0, B >= 0
vector<int> sub(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B)
{
    vector<int> C;
    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size(); i ++ )
    {
        t = A[i] - t;
        if (i < B.size()) t -= B[i];
        C.push_back((t + 10) % 10);
        if (t < 0) t = 1;
        else t = 0;
    }

    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}

é«˜ç²¾åº¦ä¹˜æ³•

//é«˜ç²¾åº¦ä¹˜ä»¥ä½ç²¾åº¦
// C = A * b, A >= 0, b > 0
vector<int> mul(vector<int> &A, int b)
{
    vector<int> C;

    int t = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < A.size() || t; i ++ )
    {
        if (i < A.size()) t += A[i] * b;
        C.push_back(t % 10);
        t /= 10;
    }

    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();

    return C;
}

//é«˜ç²¾åº¦ä¹˜ä»¥é«˜ç²¾åº¦O(n2)ï¼Œå¿…è¦æ—¶ç”¨FFTä¼˜åŒ–
vector<int> mul(vector<int> A, vector<int> B)
{
    vector<int> C(A.size() + B.size());

    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i ++ )
        for (int j = 0; j < B.size(); j ++ )
            C[i + j] += A[i] * B[j];

    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < C.size() || t; i ++ )
    {
        t += C[i];
        if (i >= C.size()) C.push_back(t % 10);
        else C[i] = t % 10;
        t /= 10;
    }

    while (C.size() > 1 && !C.back()) C.pop_back();

    return C;
}

é«˜ç²¾åº¦é™¤æ³•

// A / b = C ... r, A >= 0, b > 0
vector<int> div(vector<int> &A, int b, int &r)
{
    vector<int> C;
    r = 0;
    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i -- )
    {
        r = r * 10 + A[i];
        C.push_back(r / b);
        r %= b;
    }
    reverse(C.begin(), C.end());
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}

é«˜ç²¾åº¦æ¯”å¤§å°

vector<int> max_vec(vector<int> a, vector<int> b)
{
	if(a.size() > b.size()) return a;
	if(a.size() < b.size()) return b;
	if(vector<int>(a.rbegin(), a.rend()) > 
	vector<int>(b.rbegin(), b.rend())) return a;
	return b;
}

é«˜ç²¾åº¦è¾“å‡º

void output(vector<int> a)
{
	for(int i=a.size()-1; i>=0; i--) cout<<a[i]; 
}
